# adding labels to code cells

"give the full version of this file after adding unique missing labels for code cells"

# adding table and figure captions

"give the full version of this file after adding missing captions for table and figure cells. These should follow the label using this form:

#| fig-caption: "A caption for the figure"
or
#| table-caption: "A caption for the table"

"


# adding id to all equations

"
give the full version of this file after adding unique missing labels for display equations - the equation needs a final \qquad and a unique label at the end of the equation. E.g.


$$
\pi \qquad
$$ {#eq-pi}


and ensuring two newline before and after
"
